_COMMENT0: fields named _COMMENT are ignored, only purpose to serve as a meta_data
_COMMENT1: # Skillz (We do not want to do this in the init so I am making it a label):
_COMMENT3: # 1) skills with 'item_only':true are available for characters only if some item is equipped. it's mostly weapon skills, but there is already one shield spell too; they still are freely available for mobs though.
_COMMENT4: # 2) skills with 'mob_only':true should only be available for mobs via mobs json
_COMMENT5: # 3) spells have tiers from 0 to 4. we need at very least twice as many spells to have tiers from 0 to 9, so 0-4 will do for now
_COMMENT6: # Note that item_only and mob_only skills don't have tiers, they are not needed as long as tiers are not a part of BE AI
name: Sword Slash
desc: An attack with a blade.

name: Moon Projective Slash
desc: The inner powers of the weapon allow performing attacks even at great distance.

name: Moon Slice
desc: Uses the rotation energy of the Moon to perform a deadly strike.

name: Dark Slash
desc: An attack with a dark sword.

name: Dark Projective Slash
desc: Dark inner powers of the weapon allow performing attacks even at great distance.

name: Demonic Core
desc: Concentrates inner powers of the weapon to perform a powerful attack. Critical strikes are especially dangerous.

name: Light Slash
desc: An attack with a light sword.

name: Light Field
desc: Countless cascading blades of pure light leave no place for escape.

name: Angelic Rain
desc: Concentrates inner powers of the weapon to summon blades of light.

name: Chop Rush
desc: A deadly combination of heavy sharp blade and high speed. Critical hits are especially dangerous.

name: Ice Slash
desc: An attack with an ice blade.

name: Ice Slash 4X
desc: Four quick strikes with an ice sword.

name: Big Ice Break
desc: Released inner powers of the dagger summon a sharp ice formation.

name: Excalibur Slash
desc: Even a normal attack draws in the power of elements as a result of microcracks in the space itself.

_COMMENT: # todo post beta: unique target_sprite_damage_effect for superior multielemental weapons like Excalibur
name: Full Power Slash
desc: Power of the weapon distorts space on the path of the blade, causing a powerful shockwave.

name: Consecutive Slashes
desc: Multiple rapid attacks cause local space collapsing.

name: Soul Blade
desc: Projects a huge blade made from the user's soul energy.

name: Weapon Dance
desc: Multiple elegant strikes in quick succession.

name: Solar Incision
desc: A small artificial sun explodes in front of the target.

name: Projective Slash
desc: With special enchantments, even simplest blades can be used to summon cutting waves.

name: Steel Flourish
desc: Quick consecutive slashes form an ancient rune which increases critical damage of the attack.

name: Toxic Core
desc: Inner layers of the weapon produce natural toxins which could be released during the attack.

name: Air Assault
desc: Countless quick slashes rip the air itself, sending rapid shockwaves.

name: Bow Shot
desc: An arrow shot.

name: Bow Shot 2X
desc: Shooting two arrows in quick succession.

name: Bow Shot 4X
desc: Shooting four arrows in quick succession.

name: Light Shot
desc: Shot an arrow made of light.

name: Dark Shot
desc: Shot an arrow made of darkness.

name: Poison Arrow
desc: Shot a poisonous arrow.

name: Emerald Arrow
desc: Shot an arrow empowered with nature itself.

name: Ice Shot
desc: Shot an ice arrow.

desc: Shot an arrow of frozen water.

desc: Countless enchanted arrows are coming from above.

name: Crossbow Shot

desc: Releases special high-density bolt with high critical damage.

name: Dagger Strike

name: Rapid Strikes

name: Ice Break

name: Poisoned Dagger
desc: An attack with a poisoned dagger.

desc: Blade enchantment materializes a good deal of poison above the target.

name: Shadow Kunai
desc: Creates an explosive shadow copy of the weapon which can be thrown at the target.

name: Shadow Contract
desc: Establishes a spiritual connection between shadow scrolls and the targets. All that remains is to destroy the said scrolls.

desc: An attack with claws.

name: Claw Slash 2X
desc: Two quick attacks with claws.

name: Claw Slash 4X
desc: Four quick attacks with claws.

name: Fist Attack
desc: An attack with bare hands.

name: Fist Attack 2X
desc: Two quick attacks with bare hands.

name: Fist Attack 4X
desc: Two quick attacks with bare hands.

name: Fire Barrage
desc: A high-speed combination of attacks, fast enough to set air ablaze.

name: Cannon Shot
desc: Shot a large caliber.

name: Blunt Strike
desc: An attack with a blunt weapon.

name: Ground Shockwave
desc: Sends a shockwave powerful enough to cause a local earthquake.

name: Axe Strike
desc: An attack with an axe.

name: Axe Strike 2X
desc: Two quick attacks with an axe.

name: Axe Strike 4X
desc: Four quick attacks with an axe.

name: Ice Axe Strike
desc: An attack with an ice axe.

name: Bite
desc: Biting with fangs.

name: Gun Shot
desc: Shot a bullet.

name: Scythe Slash
desc: An attack with a scythe.

name: Scythe Slash 2X
desc: Two quick attacks with a scythe.

name: Scythe Slash 4X
desc: Four quick attacks with a scythe.

name: Steel Assault
desc: Quick consecutive slashes capable of damaging multiple enemies.

name: Harvesting Time

name: Spray
desc: Spray a dangerous substance.

name: Throw
desc: Throw a projectile.

name: Shadow Shuriken
desc: Throw an explosive shadow projectile.

name: Cloud of Knives
desc: Throw multiple knives in quick succession.

name: Whip Strike
desc: An attack with a whip.

name: Whip Strike 2X
desc: Two quick attacks with a whip.

name: Shocker Whip
desc: A whip attack charged with electricity. Double pleasure, double pain.

name: Lightning Whip
desc: Powerful lightning strike used to do battle by artificial beings.

name: Heat Discharge
desc: Releases a discharge of heat energy.

name: Ice Sphere
desc: Creates a simple projectile made of ice.

name: Stone Fist
desc: The earth itself becomes an extension of the hand to deal a powerful blow.

name: Web Vortex
desc: A vortex of spider web crashes the target.

name: Power Pack
desc: Spirits of ancient long dead wolves assist in battle, attacking the target from the spirits world.

name: Power Bear
desc: A spirit of ancient long dead bear assists in battle, attacking the target from the spirits world.

name: Sharpest Claws
desc: Multiple quick attacks with sharp deadly claws.

name: Fire
desc: Ignites a small plot of the land.

name: Fira
desc: Ignites the air in a limited area.

name: Firaga
desc: Creates liquid fire that envelopes the target, causing massive burns.

name: Firaja
desc: Creates a rain of fire that hits all enemies.

name: Fireball
desc: Summons an explosive fireball.

_COMMENT: # should be unavailable for player, made specially for a boss
name: Self-Division
desc: Summons an explosive fireball filled with twisted energy.

name: Solar Flash
desc: Summons a small piece of solar plasma.

name: Meteor
desc: Summons flaming fragments of a meteor.

name: Flame Vortex
desc: Sizzling hot air flow burns everything on the way.

name: Cataclysm
desc: A massive spontaneous air combustion.

name: Water
desc: Crushes targets by bubbles of water.

name: Watera
desc: High-pressure water jets pierce through the target.

name: Waterga
desc: A cloud of water droplets at high speed crashes into the target.

name: Waterja
desc: Creates a powerful burst of water and steam from the ground.

name: Last Drop
desc: Hits the target with a massive water blast from above.

name: Geyser
desc: A powerful stream of water shoots from the ground.

name: Heavy Rain
desc: Summons a rain of extra heavy water from another dimension.

name: High Tide
desc: A huge tidal wave instantly crashes all enemies.

name: Blizzard
desc: Creates a cloud of sharp ice splinters.

name: Blizzara
desc: Ice blades grow out of the ground.

name: Blizzarga
desc: Freezes the air itself, creating deadly ice blades.

name: Blizzarja
desc: Quickly draws heat from a small area.

name: Ice Blast
desc: Summons frozen fragments of a meteor.

name: Zero Prism
desc: Freezes the target into a solid ice block.

name: Ice Shards
desc: A small part of the target immediately freezes and explodes.

name: Hailstorm
desc: Puts targets in a middle of a small, but violent snow storm.

name: Ice Storm
desc: Conjures a power ice storm from a remote cold planet.

name: Stone
desc: Creates a cloud of hardened sharp clay.

name: Stonera
desc: Creates a sharp stone spike.

name: Stonega
desc: Summons magma to the surface.

name: Stoneja
desc: A small part of the target becomes stone and shatters into a thousand pieces.

name: Breach
desc: Summons hot dust and poisonous gases under high pressure.

name: Transmutation
desc: The land itself becomes explosive and detonates.

name: Rift Line
desc: Summons a huge flow of magma to the surface.

name: Fist of Bethel
desc: The fist of an ancient underground deity crashes all enemies.

name: Aero
desc: High-pressure air cuts through armor and flesh like a hardened blade.

name: Aerora
desc: Causes damage by sand and branches picked up by the wind rather than air itself.

name: Aeroga
desc: Even for those who don't need to breathe instantaneous air pressure drop is dangerous.

name: Aeroja
desc: High pressure air flows cover a small area.

name: Pressure
desc: Pumps air from the target, crushing it by external atmospheric pressure.

name: Air Blast
desc: Pumps air into the target, tearing it from the inside.

name: Vortex
desc: Creates a small but very powerful sphere of hurricane winds.

name: Northern Flow
desc: Summons frozen air from the upper atmosphere. Ignores back row damage reduction.

name: Tornado
desc: Conjures a full-fledged but short-lived tornado to wipe out all enemies.

name: Thunder
desc: Shocks with static electricity caused by friction of airborne particles.

name: Thundara
desc: Surrounds the target by an electric field.

name: Thundaga
desc: Creates a ball of ionized hot air.

name: Thundaja
desc: Covers a small area by lightning discharges.

name: Ion Blast
desc: Hits the target with a cloud of charged particles.

name: Electromagnetism
desc: Takes control over charged particles inside the target, causing severe internal injuries.

name: Thunderstorm
desc: Covers a small area with numerous high-voltage discharges.

name: Ion Storm
desc: Hits the targets with a raging cloud of charged particles.

name: Full Discharge
desc: Hits the target with magically concentrated and amplified burst of atmospheric electricity. Ignores back row damage reduction.

name: Thunderstorm Front
desc: Releases a full-scale thunderstorm incinerating enemies with countless lightnings.

name: Holy
desc: A flash of light energy burns targets from inside.

name: Holyra
desc: A sphere of light energy burns the target from all sides.

name: Holyda
desc: Summons a small particle of stellar energy near the target.

name: Holyja
desc: Gathers holy energy and releases it upwards like a pillar of light.

name: Star Light
desc: A powerful and painful flash of starlight.

name: Photon Blade
desc: Infinitely thin blades of pure light slices the target.

name: Forced Dawn
desc: The energy of a whole sunrise quickly covers a small area.

name: Holy Blast
desc: Concentrates all holy energy in the area into one point, forcing it to explode as it reaches critical levels.

name: Holy Touch
desc: Simple way to kill all his enemies.

name: Dark
desc: The mere presence of dark energy is dangerous for most creatures.

name: Darkra
desc: Darkness envelops the target, damaging it.

name: Darkga
desc: Negative energy concentrates in a small area and then explodes.

name: Darkja
desc: Summons abnormal and chaotic substances from a dark world that deforms targets.

name: Eternal Gluttony
desc: Summons a dark creature from the world of darkness to devour.

name: Black Hole
desc: Creates holes in the space itself leading to the dimension of Darkness.

name: Other Light
desc: Summons an alternative form of light from a dark dimension. Ignores back row damage reduction.

name: Dominion
desc: Conjures primary darkness tearing apart all living things.

_COMMENT1: # effect should be from 0 to 1, heals the max health*effect
name: Life Wind
desc: Healing wind restores health for the whole party (+10%).

name: Curer
desc: Heals superficial wounds and accelerates the healing of internal ones (+25%).

name: Restoration
desc: Concentrated flow of positive energy quickly regenerates even severe wounds (+50%).

_COMMENT: # spell for killing allies for testing; available only in debug mode
name: DarkTouch
desc: Sacrifices a party member in the name of an ancient dark creature from another dimension.

_COMMENT: # testing spell for killing enemy team on spot
name: Get Rekt
desc: Instant death! Instant death, unavoidable! I was dodging, and still got instantly killed!

name: Revive
desc: Brings an unconscious ally back to the battlefield by sharing some life energy.

_COMMENT0: # effect should be from 0 to 1, ie part of max health the poison takes every turn
name: Poison
desc: Sprays poison into the air around the target, decreasing health by 5% for 5 turns.

name: Deadly Poison
desc: Sprays concentrated poison into the air around the target, decreasing health by 10% for 3 turns.

name: Aery Field
desc: Creates a force field, reducing damage from ranged attacks.

name: Aery Shield
desc: Creates a powerful force field, reducing damage from ranged attacks.

name: Arcane Field
desc: Sets up a force field, partly shielding from magical damage.

name: Arcane Shield
desc: Sets up a powerful force field, shielding from magical damage.

name: Solid Field
desc: Sets up a force field, partly shielding from melee damage.

name: Solid Shield
desc: Sets up a powerful force field, shielding from melee damage.

name: Gray Shield
desc: The apathy of the Gray Ring denies the existence of most incoming attacks, decreasing their power because it's such a bother to deal with them...
